text: Eadweard cyngc gret wel mine byscopes & abbedes & ealle mine þegenes on Wigerceastrescire & on Gleawcestrescire freondlice.

& ic kyþe eow þæt ic habbe gegyfen Criste & Sancte Petre into Westmynstre þa land Perscoran & Deorhyrsta & eall þæt þær to herð mid saca & mid socna, mid tolle & mid teame, on stræte & of stræte, on wude & on felde & on eallan þingan swa ful & swa forþ swa hit me sylfan fyrþmest on handa stod.
& ic nelle þæt þær æni mann ænig onstyngc habbe butan se abbod & þa gebroðra to Sancte Petres niode.
& Godes bletsunga syo mid ælc þara manna þe seo hold into þam halgan mynstre.
